title: Sky trackers
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
Australian Children's Television Foundation, production company
description: It started as innocent fun and turned into an adventure of galactic proportions! Ali (Maia Brewton) lives on a NASA Satellite Tracking Station where her Mum (Pamela Sue Martin) works as a space scientist. A computer whiz, Ali spends her spare time hacking into the station's mainframe to record her personal diary. One evening while hacking into the computer she discovers a runaway satellite is out of control and heading straight for Earth and is likely to crash nearby. What she doesn't know is that the satellite contains a load of deadly cargo, so dangerous it threatens the safety of the entire world...
